divs: Sighting Detailswatched two ufos with three green lights move from the north west to the north east. from my backyard with my nieghbor. possible airplane involved or was red colored light from tip of one wing or angle looked like triangle moving slow and headed towards edwards air force base. wathed ufos for about 12-15 min. took pictures with blackberry have not viewd pictures yet from camera...
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Lancaster
There were no other sightings in Lancaster on or around December 14th 2011
Summary: multiple ufos triangle shaped headed to edwards air force base
